properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
EGYPT.
DNC 10.
S/V GHZAL, WHITE HULL WITH BLUE STRIPES, FOUR PERSONS
ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE
VICINITY 32-13.4N 031-38.2E. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO JRCC LARNACA, INMARSAT-C: 421099999,
PHONE: 357 2464 3005, FAX: 357 2464 3254
OR RCC CAIRO.
